turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order two pizzas from Domino's Pizza

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What is the location of the store you'd like to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order pickup from the Domino's on 876 Geary Street in San Francisco, California

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sounds good, what kind of pizzas would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order one large MeatZZa pizza and a Pacific Veggie of the same size

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Unfortunately, that particular shop doesn't serve the Pacific Veggie pizza

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Strange, how about the Honolulu Hawaiian for the second pizza?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: That should be fine, would you like any sides or drinks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What breads are available?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: There's Parmesan Bread Twists, Stuffed Cheesy Bread, and Parmesan Bread Bites

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like an order of the Garlic Bread Twists

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, any drinks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like one bottle of Coke

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Regular or Diet?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Regular Coke should be fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: To confirm, you want one large MeatZZa pizza, one large Honolulu Hawaiian, one order of Garlic Bread Twists, and one regular bottle of Coke?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's correct

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, your pizza order is complete and should be ready for pickup in 25 minutes

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Excellent, thank you

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem, the receipt will be sent via text message to your mobile device.

items.name: 876 Geary Street in San Francisco, California
Great, your pizza order is complete
